{{Description|A horrific mix that even Diona considers inhumane. The horrifying foretaste should be left for one's opponents. It has a crisp aftertaste, but unfortunately, one can only feel it on one's nose and skin.}}
'''Signature Mix''' is [[Diona]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|energy frame|49}}
* Drunken Mist first activates 2s after casting and every 2s afterwards for a total of 6 activations dealing {{Color|Cryo damage}} to opponents and regenerating the HP of characters within its AoE.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|2|Drunkards' Farce|character=Diona|talent=Signature Mix}}
** Despite what the description states, the ATK decrease is not applied to opponents immediately when they enter the AoE of Drunken Mist created by Signature Mix. Instead it is applied periodically to enemies inside the AoE every time Drunken Mist's damage and healing over time activate.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|1|A Lingering Flavor}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|A—Another Round?}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Wine Industry Slayer}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|Cat's Tail Closing Time|Buffs characters within the radius of Signature Mix as follows:}}
** Characters at or below 50% HP have their Incoming Healing Bonus increased by 30%.
** Characters above 50% HP have their [[Elemental Mastery]] increased by 200.
